verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> away to the other <S%G4008>side<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> which is also called the Sea of <S%G5085>Tiberias.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> at <S%G1451>hand.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G3985>test<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> he <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G4160>do.<s%>

<S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> "Two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>denarii<s%> worth of <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G714>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G714>sufficient<s%> for <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1538>everyone<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> may <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G1024>little.<s%>"
<S%G1520>One<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>'s <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%>

"There <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G3808>boy<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2916>barley<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3795>fish,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> so <S%G5118>many?<s%>"

<S%G3767>So<s%> they <S%G4863>gathered<s%> them <S%G4863>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1072>filled<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> with broken <S%G2801>pieces<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2916>barley<s%> <S%G740>loaves,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> were left <S%G4052>over<s%> by those who had <S%G977>eaten.<s%>

<S%G3767>When<s%> therefore the <S%G444>people<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> they <S%G3754>said,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G230>truly<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> who <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"

<S%G3767><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G1097>perceiving<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they were about <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G726>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> by <S%G726>force,<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G402>withdrew<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G3441>by<s%> <S%G846>himself.<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1684>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> and were <S%G2064>going<s%> <S%G4008>over<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum.<s%> <S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G4653>dark,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>had<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161>However<s%> <S%G243><s%> <S%G4142>boats<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G5085>Tiberias<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> near <S%G1451>to<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> they <S%G5315>ate<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G2168>after<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had given <S%G2168>thanks.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on the other <S%G4008>side<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> they <S%G2036>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> <S%G4219>when<s%> did <S%G1096>you<s%> come <S%G5602>here?<s%>"

<S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G2038>work<s%> for the <S%G1035>food<s%> which <S%G622>perishes,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> for the <S%G1035>food<s%> which <S%G3306>remains<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G4972>has<s%> <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G5126>him.<s%>"

<S%G2257>Our<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G5315>ate<s%> the <S%G3131>manna<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%> <S%G2531>As<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1325><s%> 'He gave <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> to <S%G5315>eat.<s%>'"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G281>"Most<s%> <S%G281>certainly,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> it <S%G3756>wasn't<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> who <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1325>gives<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G740>the<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> that which comes <S%G2597>down<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gives<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> to the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"
<S%G2036>They<s%> said <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>"

<S%G235>But<s%> I <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3708>you<s%> <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> yet you <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> I have come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> my <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>
